titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Presbyterian Home for Aged Couples and Aged Men, later known as Presbyterian Home for Aged Couples and Aged Persons was located at 4700 City Line Ave., Philadelphia. The Presbyterian Home for Widows and Single Women was located at 58th and Greenway Avenue.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of several Presbyterian Homes for the Aged. Materials include: a 1959 Annual Report for the Presbyterian Home for Aged Couples and Aged Person; Charter and by-laws for Presbyterian Home for Widows and Single Women; and Charter and by-laws, list of requirements for admission, and a survey with recommendations for the Presbyterian Home for Aged Couples and Aged Men.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
